nbdev_cards
================

<!-- WARNING: THIS FILE WAS AUTOGENERATED! DO NOT EDIT! -->

A deck of cards demo of [nbdev](https://nbdev.fast.ai).

## Install

Install using:

``` sh
pip install nbdev_cards
```

## How to use

This lib helps use cards:

``` python
Card(1,3)
```

    3♦

Suits are numbered according to this list:

``` python
suits
```

    ['♣', '♦', '♥', '♠']
